creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: creamware; tea and coffee service all hand painted with small red flowers and green leaves with black edge trim over the glaze; coffee pot has high dome cover; teapot has a drum shape; tea caddy was used to hold the tea leaves and most likely had a cover; waste bowl is large; coffee or tea was served so only one set of saucers was needed
title: Cup, from a Child's Tea Set
